		const playerDivId = 'connatix_floating_preroll_ad_div';
		cnx.cmd.push(function() {
			cnx({
				playerId: '4057afa6-846b-4276-bc63-a9cf3a8aa1ed',
				playlistId: 'b7dab6e5-7a62-4df1-b1f4-3cfa99eea709',
			}).render(playerDivId, function(cnxErr, cnxPlayerInstance) {
				if (!cnxErr) {
					const cnxReadyEvt = new CustomEvent('cnxReady', {
						bubbles: true,
						cancelable: true,
						detail: { playerInstance: cnxPlayerInstance }
					});
					cnxPlayerInstance.on(cnx.configEvents.Play, function() {
						document.getElementById(playerDivId).dispatchEvent(cnxReadyEvt);
					});
				}
			});
		});
	</script>
</div> </div>

<div class="lrv-u-position-relative post-1479786 pmc-chart type-pmc-chart status-publish hentry charts_categories-overall-popularity" id="post-1479786">
<div class="lrv-a-wrapper">
<div class="charts-title lrv-u-position-relative // lrv-u-width-100p lrv-u-padding-b-2 u-padding-b-350@tablet u-max-width-970 lrv-u-margin-lr-auto">
<div class="">
<h1 class="c-heading larva lrv-u-text-align-center lrv-u-color-black a-font-primary-bold-l u-font-size-81@desktop u-font-size-51 u-line-height-chart-title@desktop u-letter-spacing-0063@tablet u-line-height-125 u-padding-t-250 u-line-height-1@mobile-max lrv-u-padding-t-150@mobile-max u-padding-b-chart-title@desktop" id="section-heading">

	
		Billboard Hot 100
	
	</h1>
<div class="u-hidden@tablet lrv-u-text-align-center lrv-u-padding-b-150">
<span class="c-span lrv-u-whitespace-nowrap">
<a class="c-span__link a-font-primary-bold-s u-letter-spacing-0080 lrv-a-icon-arrow-left a-icon-after-10 lrv-a-icon-before lrv-u-cursor-pointer lrv-u-text-transform-uppercase" href="/charts/">

	All Charts
	</a>
</span>
</div>

<h2 class="c-heading larva a-font-primary-medium-xs u-font-size-11@mobile-max u-letter-spacing-0106 u-letter-spacing-0089@mobile-max lrv-u-line-height-copy lrv-u-text-transform-uppercase lrv-u-text-align-center lrv-u-margin-b-075" id="section-heading">

	
		Week of February 8, 2020
	
	</h2>
<div data-date="2020-02-08" data-link="https://www.billboard.com/charts/hot-100/" id="chart-date-picker"></div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="lrv-u-position-relative a-show-on-hover-parent a-chart-info-opener">

<span class="lrv-a-screen-reader-only" title="">Info</span>
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="c-icon lrv-u-display-block u-width-50 u-height-50 lrv-u-border-radius-50p lrv-u-margin-l-1 lrv-u-cursor-pointer a-font-primary-bold-xl">

<div class="a-show-on-hover-on-tab no-transition">
<div class="charts-flyout // lrv-u-margin-t-1 u-width-250@mobile-max u-width-356@tablet u-margin-l-n1550@tablet u-margin-l-n1000@mobile-max u-z-index-middle-bottom lrv-u-position-relative lrv-u-padding-tb-2 lrv-u-padding-lr-1 lrv-u-border-a-1 u-box-shadow-author a-icon-after-arrow-top-right lrv-u-background-color-white">
<h2 class="c-heading larva lrv-u-border-b-1 lrv-u-padding-b-050 lrv-u-border-color-grey a-font-primary-bold-m" id="section-heading">

	
		Billboard Hot 100
	
	</h2>
<p class="c-tagline a-font-primary-s lrv-u-padding-b-1">THE WEEKS MOST POPULAR CURRENT SONGS ACROSS ALL GENRES, RANKED BY STREAMING ACTIVITY FROM DIGITAL MUSIC SOURCES TRACKED BY LUMINATE, RADIO AIRPLAY AUDIENCE IMPRESSIONS AS MEASURED BY LUMINATE AND SALES DATA AS COMPILED BY LUMINATE.</p>
<a class="c-link lrv-a-unstyle-link lrv-u-flex u-align-items-baseline lrv-u-justify-content-center lrv-u-text-transform-uppercase a-font-primary-bold-xxs lrv-u-color-brand-secondary lrv-a-icon-arrow-right lrv-a-icon-after a-icon-after-10 lrv-u-cursor-pointer" href="https://www.billboard.com/billboard-charts-legend/">
	see charts legends</a>
</div>
</div>

<h3 class="c-title a-font-primary-bold-l a-font-primary-bold-m@mobile-max lrv-u-color-black u-color-white@mobile-max lrv-u-margin-r-150" id="">
<a class="c-title__link lrv-a-unstyle-link" href="#">
	
		
					The Box		
					</a>
</h3>
<p class="c-tagline a-font-primary-l a-font-primary-m@mobile-max lrv-u-color-black u-color-white@mobile-max lrv-u-margin-tb-00 lrv-u-padding-t-025 lrv-u-margin-r-150">Roddy Ricch</p>

<h3 class="c-title a-no-trucate a-font-primary-bold-s u-letter-spacing-0021 lrv-u-font-size-18@tablet lrv-u-font-size-16 u-line-height-125 u-line-height-normal@mobile-max a-truncate-ellipsis u-max-width-330 u-max-width-230@tablet-only" id="title-of-a-story">

	
	
		
					Someone You Loved		
	
</h3>
<span class="c-label a-no-trucate a-font-primary-s lrv-u-font-size-14@mobile-max u-line-height-normal@mobile-max u-letter-spacing-0021 lrv-u-display-block a-truncate-ellipsis-2line u-max-width-330 u-max-width-230@tablet-only">

					Songwriter(s):

<h3 class="c-title a-no-trucate a-font-primary-bold-s u-letter-spacing-0021 lrv-u-font-size-18@tablet lrv-u-font-size-16 u-line-height-125 u-line-height-normal@mobile-max a-truncate-ellipsis u-max-width-330 u-max-width-230@tablet-only" id="title-of-a-story">

	
	
		
					Truth Hurts		
	
</h3>
<span class="c-label a-no-trucate a-font-primary-s lrv-u-font-size-14@mobile-max u-line-height-normal@mobile-max u-letter-spacing-0021 lrv-u-display-block a-truncate-ellipsis-2line u-max-width-330 u-max-width-230@tablet-only">

<h3 class="c-title a-font-primary-medium-s u-letter-spacing-0021" id="title-of-a-story">

	
	
		
					Songwriter(s):

<li class="o-chart-results-list__item // a-chart-color u-width-72 u-width-55@mobile-max u-width-55@tablet-only lrv-u-flex lrv-u-flex-shrink-0 lrv-u-align-items-center lrv-u-justify-content-center lrv-u-border-b-1 u-border-b-0@mobile-max lrv-u-border-color-grey-light u-background-color-white-064@mobile-max lrv-u-flex-grow-1">
<span class="c-label a-font-primary-m lrv-u-padding-tb-050@mobile-max">
	
	4
</span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<div class="o-chart-credits // lrv-u-margin-t-2 lrv-u-margin-t-125@mobile-max">
<h3 class="c-title a-font-primary-medium-s u-letter-spacing-0021" id="title-of-a-story">

	
	
		
					Songwriter(s):		
	
</h3>
<p class="c-tagline a-font-primary-s u-letter-spacing-0021 lrv-u-margin-t-00">D.D.White, Jr., D.A.Jones, B.L.Chambers</p>

<h3 class="c-title a-no-trucate a-font-primary-bold-s u-letter-spacing-0021 lrv-u-font-size-18@tablet lrv-u-font-size-16 u-line-height-125 u-line-height-normal@mobile-max a-truncate-ellipsis u-max-width-330 u-max-width-230@tablet-only" id="title-of-a-story">

	
	
		
					Chasin' You		
	
</h3>

	Morgan Wallen

</span>

	30

<h3 class="c-title a-font-primary-medium-s u-letter-spacing-0021" id="title-of-a-story">

	
	
		
					Songwriter(s):

<p class="c-tagline a-font-primary-s u-letter-spacing-0021 lrv-u-margin-t-00">M.B.Mathers III, E.C.Sheeran, F.J.P.Gibson, L.E.Resto, d.a. got that dope, A.Hozier-Byrne</p>

<li class="o-nav__list-item lrv-a-font-primary-s lrv-u-padding-tb-050 lrv-u-color-brand-accent-blue:hover">

<h4 class="a-font-primary-bold-m c-title lrv-u-display-block lrv-u-margin-b-2">Subscriptions</h4>
<div class="pmc-bb-footer-subscription-btn lrv-u-margin-b-1"></div>
<a class="a-font-primary-bold-xs lrv-u-border-a-1 lrv-u-color-white lrv-u-padding-lr-1 lrv-u-padding-tb-075 lrv-u-text-transform-uppercase lrv-u-display-inline-block lrv-u-width-100p lrv-u-text-align-center" href="https://www.billboard.com/frequently-asked-questions/">
								Customer Service							</a>
</section>
</div>

	Songwriters &amp; Producers</a>

<div class="lrv-u-flex lrv-u-align-items-center lrv-u-padding-a-050 u-border-t-1@desktop-max lrv-u-border-color-grey">
<svg class="c-icon lrv-u-height-100p lrv-u-width-100p">
<use xlink:href="#pmc-logo"></use>
</svg>
<small class="lrv-u-padding-l-1 lrv-u-color-white lrv-u-font-family-basic lrv-u-font-weight-normal lrv-u-font-size-10">Billboard is a part of Penske Media Corporation. © 2023 Billboard Media, LLC. All Rights Reserved.</small>
</div>
</div>
</footer>
</div>
</div>

<div class="pub_300x250 pub_300x250m pub_728x90 text-ad textAd text_ad text_ads text-ads text-ad-links" id="pmc-ad-bait" style="width: 0 !important; height: 0 !important; position: fixed !important; left: -99999px !important;">ad</div>
<script>
			if ( 'undefined' !== typeof jQuery ) {
				var $pmc_ad_bait = jQuery('#pmc-ad-bait');
				if ( $pmc_ad_bait.length ) {
					if ( 'block' !== $pmc_ad_bait.css('display') ) {
						window.pmc_is_adblocked = true;
					}
				}
			}
		</script>
<script>
	/**
	 * Remove all elements with this selector.
	 *
	 * @param selectors Array of selectors.
	 */
	function pmc_onetrust_remove_elements( selectors ) {
		if ( 'object' !== typeof selectors ) {
			return;
		}

		for ( var i = 0; i < selectors.length; i++ ) {
			var element = ( 'li' === selectors[i].parentNode.nodeName.toLowerCase() ) ? selectors[i].parentElement : selectors[i];

			element.remove();
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Toggle clicks of elements with this selector.
	 *
	 * @param selectors Array of selectors.
	 */
	function pmc_onetrust_toggle_clicks( selectors ) {
		if ( 'object' !== typeof selectors || 'object' !== typeof OneTrust ) {
			return;
		}

		for ( var i = 0; i < selectors.length; i++ ) {
			var element = ( 'li' === selectors[i].parentNode.nodeName.toLowerCase() ) ? selectors[i].parentElement : selectors[i];

			element.addEventListener( 'click', function( e ) {
				e.preventDefault();
				OneTrust.ToggleInfoDisplay();
			} );
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Is the user's current region an opt-in region?
	 *
	 * Opt-in regions are those where certain cookie categories are disabled by
	 * default but can be opted into. Example: GDPR
	 *
	 * @return bool
	 */
	function pmc_onetrust_is_opt_in_region() {
		return 'EU' === pmc_fastly_geo_data.continent;
	}

	/**
	 * Is the users's current region an opt-out region?
	 *
	 * Opt-out regions are those where certain cookie categories are enabled by
	 * default but can be opted out of. Examples: California, Virginia.
	 *
	 * @return bool
	 */
	function pmc_onetrust_is_opt_out_region() {
		return [
			'CA',
			'CO',
			'CT',
			'VA',
		].includes( pmc_fastly_geo_data.region );
	}

	/**
	 * Is the user's current region California?
	 *
	 * @return bool
	 */
	function pmc_onetrust_is_ca() {
		return 'CA' === pmc_fastly_geo_data.region;
	}


	if ( 'object' === typeof pmc_fastly_geo_data ) {
		var optOutLink = document.querySelectorAll( "a[href='https:\/\/pmc.com\/opt-out']" );
		var optInLink = document.querySelectorAll( ".o-nav__list .privacy-consent" );

		// Only leave CA link for CA visitors.
		if ( ! pmc_onetrust_is_ca() ) {
			pmc_onetrust_remove_elements( document.querySelectorAll(
				"a[href='https:\/\/pmc.com\/privacy-policy\/#california']"			) );
		}

		// CCPA and the like (CA, CO, CT, VA, etc).
		if ( pmc_onetrust_is_opt_out_region() ) {
			pmc_onetrust_remove_elements( optInLink );
			pmc_onetrust_toggle_clicks( optOutLink );

			// GDPR.
		} else if ( pmc_onetrust_is_opt_in_region() ) {
			pmc_onetrust_remove_elements( optOutLink );
			pmc_onetrust_toggle_clicks( optInLink );

			// Everywhere else.
		} else {
			pmc_onetrust_remove_elements( optInLink );
			pmc_onetrust_remove_elements( optOutLink );
		}
	}
</script>

		var _comscore = _comscore || []; _comscore.push(comscore_vals); (function() { var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.async = true; s.src = (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? 		// Added to ensure that Comscore tags are triggered to fire on each slide of galleries
		(function(history){
			var pushState = history.pushState;
			history.pushState = function(state) {
			if (typeof history.onpushstate == "function") {
				history.onpushstate({state: state});
			}

			return pushState.apply(history, arguments);
			}
		})(window.history);

		// Trigger comscore beacon on change location.href
		window.onpopstate = history.onpushstate = function() {
			if ( COMSCORE !== undefined ) {
				setTimeout( function() {
					COMSCORE.beacon(comscore_vals);
				}, 1);
			}
		};
	</script>
<!-- end pmc-tags-bottom Comscore --><!-- pmc-tags-bottom Global --><!-- START callback function for onhashchange(when the hash tag in the url gets updated) -->
<script type="text/javascript">
window.pmc = window.pmc || {};
window.pmc.analytics = window.pmc.analytics || [];

function global_urlhashchanged() {
	/**
	 * Track pageview
	 */
	// Build the current domain name
	var tmp_td = document.domain.split('.');
	var tracking_domain = tmp_td[tmp_td.length-2] + "." + tmp_td[tmp_td.length-1];

	// Build the current image
	var imgname = location.hash.replace('#','');
	try {
		window.pmc.analytics.push(function() {
			window.pmc.analytics.track_pageview( location.pathname + location.hash );
		});
	} catch(err) {}

	try {
		if ( typeof window.snowplowKW == 'function' ) {
			console.log('sending tracking code');
			window.snowplowKW( 'trackPageView' );
		}
	} catch ( err ) {
	}

	// Track Quantcast
	try {

		// need to reset the array containing the options previously sent
		// as quantcast does not send the same key twice.
		if (__qc && __qc.qpixelsent && __qc.qpixelsent.length > 0) {
			__qc.qpixelsent.length = 0;
		}
		// First Quantcast Tag
		_qoptions={
			qacct:""
		};

		quantserve();

	} catch(err) {}

	// Track Comscore unless it's a gallery and has been tracked
	if ( window.pmc.comscoreTracked && -1 === window.pmc.comscoreTracked.indexOf( document.location.href ) ) {
		try {
			setTimeout(function(){var url = "http" + (/^https:/.test(document.location.href) ? "s" : "") + "://beacon.scorecardresearch.com/scripts/beacon.dll" + "?c1=2&amp;c2=6035310&amp;c3=&amp;c4=&amp;c5=&amp;c6=&amp;c7=" + escape(document.location.href) + "&amp;c8=" + escape(document.title) + "&amp;c9=" + escape(document.referrer) + "&amp;c10=" + escape(screen.width + 'x' + screen.height) + "&amp;rn=" + (new Date()).getTime();var i = new Image();i.src = url;}, 1);

			COMSCORE.beacon({c1:2,c2:"6035310",c3:"6035310",c4:"",c5:"",c6:"",c15:""});

		} catch(err) {}
	}

	
	/**
	* Track pageview end
	*/
}
</script>
<!-- end pmc-tags-bottom Global --><!-- pmc-tags-bottom Digioh -->
